C

Canvas - Class in Pacman
Canvas is a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.
Case - Class in Pacman
The class Case represents a square on the board.

changeList() - Method in class Pacman.Level
Loads the file that contains the level corresponding to the index
checkCollision(Entity) - Method in class Pacman.Entity
Vérifie si l'entité actuelle est en collision avec l'entitée
checkEndGame() - Method in class Pacman.Level
Check all the end game cases, which are: Pacman has no lives left, there are no bonuses left
checkLevel(int) - Method in enum Pacman.Bonus
Checks if the level is inside the bonus' range
close() - Method in class Pacman.Canvas
Destroys the main JFrame component and closes the window
computeNextFrame() - Method in class Pacman.Level
Checks the ending scenarios with Level.checkEndGame(), calls Level.endGame(int) if 1 or 2.
